overview: Contains 4 independent short films. "Good Deeds", "Glen's Cove" and "Country Style" and "Better in Bed". "Good Deeds" was originally released in 1978 under the title "Swinging". "Country Style" was originally released in 1977 under the title "Behind the Barn". "Better in Bed" was originally released in 1981 under the title "Bush Hog".
title: Bullet Videopac 4
